Minimum open close Free Delivery FACEBOOK Google Most Popular Add to Cart Checkout Welcome to the world of advanced nutrition, with a seamless blend of functional ingredients to boost your health in a balanced and delicious tiffin box. We provide high quality nutritious, calorie defined meal plans with specially designed meals to suit your health and wellness requirements. The iTiffin meals are packed in world class packaging material, quality assured on European Standards and delivered fresh to our customer’s doorstep. The contamination proof packaging is done under high quality assurance standards based on the HACCP standards in our kitchens. Treat yourself to some TLC…Therapeutic Lifestyle Changes to achieve better health and wellness; and at the same time enjoy the pleasure of eating healthy and tasty meals. Our product is made by a team of food and nutrition scientists, expert chefs; delivered by our supply chain experts all set along the robust tenets of precise design. Enjoy the harmonious balance of nutrients and taste; which help keep your blood sugar under control, develop better immunity, have a healthier heart, help children grow better and achieve optimum nutrition through the iTiffin meal boxes. Healthy combination of fibre, judicious blend of nutrients and taste with the superior benefits of low fat food cooked exclusively in olive oil, is the pleasures of advanced nutrition promised by iTiffin. Contact Us 0 Review Share Add Your Review Enter your Details GENDER AND UNIT OF MEASUREMENT Gender Mon -Sat, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM Email : mobisupport@itiffin.in Contact Number : +91 7353230000 Diet Goal Select Goal M F MEASUREMENT UNITS Pounds and Feet/Inches Kilograms and Centimetres Feet Inch Maintain my current weight Slow weight loss Weight Loss Weight Gain Slow weight gain Body Mass Index Body Fat Percentage Body Fat Percentage Click here For Consultation live longer live stronger : live longer live better : live longer live younger : live longer live well Waist to Hip Ratio WAIST TO HIP RATIO IDEAL WAIST TO HIP \n lessthan 0.96 WAIST TO HIP Home Screen It is defined as the waist circumference divided by the height. It measures abdominal obesity and therefore can be used as an better indicator of health risks than BMI (Body Mass Index). Is is defined as the weight of fat divided by the total weight. It is estimated with the US Navy Circumference Method which uses the height and circumferences of waist, neck and hip. HELP TOPICS (Body Mass Index) HELP TOPICS It is defined as the body weight divided by the square of the height. It only provides a rough guide since it doesnot take into account a persons build or the composition of the body weight. Therefore it is not well suited for people with a very high or low percentage of muscle mass. Choose Unit
